about_the_game:
Features

- Historical campaign with 21 scenarios in early access game
- Customizable divisions, regiments and battalions
- Many options to upgrade tanks, artillery and infantry weapons
- Core divisions and auxiliary regiments
- Units gaining experience
- Supply system, weather, ground conditions, terrain effect and transport network

Scenarios

Capture strategic points as quick as possible. Reinforcement is limited, find the best way to defeat enemy with minimal casualties. Use tank divisions to encircle large enemy formations and cut supply routs. Repel enemy counterattacks and gain air superiority. Keep eye on division strength, fatigue, supply level, road condition, weather and attrition.

Division management

You can refit, reorganize or upgrade your units between scenarios. Spend your points to get extra reinforcement, increase mobility or purchase new divisions, regiments and battalions. Attach auxiliary units to your core divisions to increase firepower and effectiveness.

Air warfare

Use fighter regiments to gain air superiority over the battlefield or intercept enemy bombers. Dive bombers can provide effective support for ground units during battle. Bombers can attack stationary targets, like airfields or troop concentrations, decreasing enemy strength, supply and entrenchment.

  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0

short_description: Panzer Doctrine is an unconventional World War II real-time strategy game. It was designed to provide interesting alternative to turn-based hex grid wargames. Complex military simulation of tank warfare on the eastern front.
